text: Just wondering, is there a way to assign templates to specific sub-domains, so individual marketing teams do not choose an incorrect template not associated with them, I know that there is a way to exclude a template from showing up, but this would be more sub-domain associated separation of templates in HubSpot
Not that I know of, I try to prefix all mine so people know
Yeh, same way here. I use the proper naming convection to make it clear for my account managers.
dang that stinks but prefixes is a good start but not sure if renaming all my templates will jack anything up, it shouldntâ€™t but I never truly know with HubSpot
